item.title: Learning framework
item.description: Learning is the crucial tool on the road to mastery and true driver of the software craftsman career. There is no way one can become successful at software development without becoming an expert in learning. I believe that effective learning contains of components so called learning framework. This framework can be applied to any kind of learning. It does not meter if it is learning the language or preparing for the OCP (Oracle Certified Professional) exam.
